00022 function getContrast(color) {
00023   var colors = color.split(",");
00024   
00025   var outR,outG,outB;
00026   outR = (colors[0]>150)?0:255;
00027   outG = (colors[1]>150)?0:255;
00028   outB = (colors[2]>150)?0:255;
00029 
00030   return outR+","+outG+","+outB;
00031 }

00044   pop.resizeTo(1024,768); 
00045   pop.moveTo(screen.availWidth / 2 - 400,screen.availHeight / 2 - 300);
00046   pop.location=url;
00047 }
